answer:
<p>There is no such selector, but in the DOM API has a pretty read-only property</p>
<p><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Node/previousSibling" rel="nofollow noreferrer"><code>Node.previousSibling</code></a></p>
data.title: Is there a "previous sibling" selector?
data.content:
<p>The plus sign (<code>+</code>) is for selecting the next sibling.</p>
<p>Is there an equivalent for the previous sibling?</p>
